channel.title: Need help coding not able to walk in trade or retrade in trade to fix a dupe
channel.description: i have a dupe on my server atm that you can trade another player\walk and there trade iterface will stay up then relog and retrade the 3rd acc and accept ect it will dupe, now how can i make it so you cant get outa trade by walking or trading need help asap please
